AI Description: ChewBBACA (Chew Sequence-Based Typing Tool) is a suite of tools specifically designed for whole-genome sequence analysis, dedicated to the provision of high-resolution sequence-based microbial genotyping.
Core Features:
1. Whole-genome sequence analysis
2. High-resolution microbial genotyping
3. Detection of core and accessory genome elements
4. Support for bacterial typing tasks
5. Analysis of large genomic datasets
6. Phylogenetic inference and visualization
General Tags: Whole-Genome Analysis, Microbial Genotyping, Bacterial Typing, Phylogenetic Inference, Bioinformatics
